message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product for $11,000. I think it could really benefit you and it's a fantastic deal.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product. I would like to propose a price of $9,500 for the product.
Thanks for your counter-offer, Bob. I understand the value this product offers, and I'm willing to come down a bit to $10,500. I believe this is a fair price that reflects its true worth.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $10,000 for the product.
